title: CLAUDE.md policy & behavioral rules
description: Add a comprehensive 3rd Party Interaction Policy section to CLAUDE.md. Define: capability boundaries (what 3rd parties can/cannot do), private info gate (ask primary before sharing calendar/personal info), enhancement capture (create to-dos for improvement ideas), interaction memory logging (log who, what, and what was shared). Update the security policy to reference 3rd-party-senders.json.

notes.content: Added 3rd Party Interaction Policy section with: Capability Boundaries (CAN/CANNOT), Private Info Gate, Interaction Logging, Enhancement Capture. Updated Security Policy to reference 3rd-party-senders.json and reinforced Secure Data Gate for 3rd parties.

acceptanceCriteria: CLAUDE.md has a '3rd Party Interaction Policy' section
Private info gate rule is documented: ask primary via Telegram before sharing calendar, personal details, schedule, location, preferences
Enhancement capture rule: create a to-do when a 3rd party interaction reveals improvement opportunities
Interaction logging rule: log 3rd party interactions to memory
The [3rdParty] message tag is explained so Claude knows how to recognize 3rd party messages
Secure Data Gate remains absolute (Keychain data never shared with 3rd parties)
